公制重量单位―分克（1/10克）的旧译。

兝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gōngfēn］
(1)公制重量单位公分的简写。
(2)法国衡制的特西克兰姆，旧时简写为兝。克兰姆的十分之一、即公制重量单位中的公厘。

The old translation of the metric unit of weight-decigram (1/10 gram).
兝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gōngfēn］
(1) The abbreviation for the metric unit of weight, centimeter.
(2) Tessikram of the French scale, formerly abbreviated as 兝. One-tenth of a cran, that is, the millimeter in the metric unit of weight.
